name: Mycelium (MekaSasquatch)
description:
Play as an out-wordly fungus hellbent into devouring all of humanity's minds.
Your fungus will mutate, and acquire powers. This implemented mutations can affect both the city you attach it to, and their surroundings.

Mycelium plays more like a diorama simulation. In case instructions aren't clear enough, You can add mutations to your captured cities (the orange ones), by selecting the city, and going to the top right grey bar. The bar shows the available mutation slots for that city. Click a mutation, and then a slot.

Made Mycelium in 48h for the DiscordJam2021.  Jam's theme was Mutation, so I made  a story about a mutagenic fungus from outer space. Mycelium has some cool visuals I made using diffusion/reaction equations, although gameplay is simple.

In case the browser version crashes (it was doing that for some reason), I also packaged a windows build.

Made by André Antonitsch - Follow me on twitter for some random CG stuff.

@andreantonitsch
